thread.title: Great property, great location, great pricing, great people!
thread.title_full: Great property, great location, great pricing, great people! - Review of Holiday Inn Manhattan - Financial District, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: pafh2017
title: Great property, great location, great pricing, great people!
text:
As a regular business traveler to NYC, I have stayed in several hotels in Downtown Manhattan. Although all have some positives, none offered everything that I wanted until I found the Holiday Inn Manhattan-Financial District!
The hotel is always clean and welcoming with spacious rooms and beautiful views, its location offers easy access to several forms of transportation, its price point is consistently competitive for its area, and its staff is always friendly and very helpful. Avinash, Cesar, and Tricia, especially, have gone out of their way to make my stays very comfortable.
If you are looking for a hotel at the south end of Manhattan that takes great care of you at affordable prices, this is the hotel!
Room Tip: Rooms on the northwest offer great views of both the Hudson and the World Trade Center site. See more room tips
